industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Direct Counsel is seeking a Law and Motion Attorney for a Plaintiff's Employment Law firm in Beverly Hills. The firm is growing and looking for quality attorneys for this full-time position.

The Position

  • Qualifications
  • JD from an Accredited law school
  • Admitted to practice in the State of California
  • 3+ years litigation experience required
  • Federal court practice is a plus
  • Strong knowledge of rules of evidence and procedure required
  • Excellent written and analytical skills and a strong attention to detail are required


Responsibilities

  • Draft case management orders, organize and analyze case information, and provide reports to carrier
  • Draft motions (including but not limited to motions for summary judgment and discovery motions)
  • Make court appearances as necessary
  • Respond to written discovery
  • Efficiently conduct legal research

Why Should You Apply?

  • Excellent Benefits including a 401k match
  • PTO plan
  • Excellent growth and advancement opportunities
  • Remote, Hybrid or fully onsite work options

The annualized salary range for this position is $130,000 to $150,000
